Package org.apache.avalon.merlin

The Merlin Kernel API defines a set of interfaces the encompass the creation criteria, controller and main kernel functionality.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Kernel A Kernel is the root of a containment solution.
KernelController The Controller interface defines a subset of management operations exposed by a kernel implementation.
KernelCriteria A service that provides access to versioned resources.
 

Exception Summary
KernelException Exception to indicate that there was an error relating to kernel execution.
KernelRuntimeException Exception to indicate that there was a runtime error related to the kernel.
 

Package org.apache.avalon.merlin Description

The Merlin Kernel API defines a set of interfaces the encompass the creation criteria, controller and main kernel functionality.
